item.title: Solve those mouse mazes! maze solver v1.0!
item.dc:creator: @Zorlin Zorlin
item.description:
@Zorlin wrote:

[quote=“Mad Cow, post:6, topic:16992”]Ummm… You declared “startTime” but never used it…

[scar]program MazeSolver;
//Welcome to Maze Solver v1.0, visit
//http://runestatus.net/com/maze.html
//target the window, and hit play. Make sure that the screen is maximized.
//PLEASE HAVE SOUND TURNED UP!! IT WONT WORK OTHERWISE!
//Enjoy! Beat all your friend to finishing the maze!
const
waitTime = 250; //Time to wait between each solve/click
startTime = 100; //Time to wait before starting the script
begin
wait(startTime);
ClickMouse(391,372, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(391,630, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(726,151, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(102,639, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(391,265, true);
wait(waitTime);
end.[/scar]

~Cow[/quote]
All I have to say to that…
[scar]program MazeSolver;
//Welcome to Maze Solver v1.0, visit
//http://runestatus.net/com/maze.html
//target the window, and hit play. Make sure that the screen is maximized.
//PLEASE HAVE SOUND TURNED UP!! IT WONT WORK OTHERWISE!
//Enjoy! Beat all your friend to finishing the maze!
const
waitTime = 250; //Time to wait between each solve/click
startTime = 100; //Time to wait before starting the script
begin
wait(startTime); //Sorry, its declared right here, look again
ClickMouse(391,372, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(391,630, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(726,151, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(102,639, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(391,265, true);
wait(waitTime);
end.[/scar]
~ <3 Zorlin

Read full topic

wait(waitTime);

wait(waitTime);
end.[/scar]

~Cow

item.title: Solve those mouse mazes! maze solver v1.0!
item.dc:creator: @Zorlin Zorlin
item.description:
@Zorlin wrote:

Currently it only works with the maze link I provided, but it will be expanded in the future!
Please test it out!

program MazeSolver;
//Welcome to Maze Solver v1.0, visit
//http://runestatus.net/com/maze.html
//target the window, and hit play. Make sure that the screen is maximized.
//PLEASE HAVE SOUND TURNED UP!! IT WONT WORK OTHERWISE!
//Enjoy! Beat all your friend to finishing the maze!
const
     waitTime = 250; //Time to wait between each solve/click
     startTime = 100; //Time to wait before starting the script
begin
ClickMouse(391,372, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(391,630, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(726,151, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(102,639, true);
wait(waitTime);
ClickMouse(391,265, true);
wait(waitTime);
end.

Its simple but it works.
I also attached the script in case you dont feel like copy and pasting.
ENJOY!

Read full topic
